entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 8 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 8 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
